Description:
PICK OF THE BUNCH
Elevate your living standards with this as-new, contemporary two-storey townhouse located moments from the hospital, railway station, La Trobe University and the CBD with its cafes, restaurants and shopping with public transport at your front gate.
The pick of the boutique development, this luxury townhouse features a sun-filled study with built-in cabinetry just inside the front entrance followed by a long hallway opening to two bedrooms complete with robes and ceiling fans, a powder room and sleek bathroom.
The hallway also provides direct access to the auto double garage with European laundry and clever storage hidden behind bi-fold doors.
The upper level is filled with northern light and comprises open-plan living, dining and galley-style kitchen kitted out with stone-topped island bench, good storage including pantry and a full suite of Miele appliances (gas cooktop, electric oven, pull-out range hood, dishwasher).
Spacious, north-facing living area adjoins an L-shaped balcony- the perfect place for relaxing with morning coffee or evening cocktails.
Also on the upper level, the master suite incorporates walk-in robe and impressive ensuite featuring 1200mm shower with rainfall shower head, twin vanities & WC.
Year-round internal comfort is assured with ducted heating and split system cooling. While a private Merbau deck at the rear provides a quiet spot to relax with family and friends for a barbecue or Sunday brunch. With a minimal Body corporate structure of under $90 pa, low maintenance living within easy reach of Bendigo's CBD, this luxury lifestyle will sure to impress.

Description:
LOCATION, PERFECT.
Individual in form and design, this two-level apartment exudes contemporary styling and a smart, clean finish. It's dressed to impress with trendy light fixtures, fuss-free window blinds, carpeted bedrooms, tiled floors in bathroom and laundry with timber-look vinyl in the living areas.
The ground floor encompasses open-plan kitchen, dining and living areas, powder room and roomy laundry with cupboards.
A large island bench with waterfall sides and striking pendant lights overhead is the star of the kitchen while cooking will be a pleasure with stainless steel gas cooktop, gas under-bench oven and double-door pantry.
Northern sunlight pours into the living area where a split system air conditioning unit maintains the internal temperature and big glass sliding doors open to an expansive timber deck for carefree alfresco entertaining.
The second level is home to two bedrooms, both fitted with built-in robes and reverse cycle air conditioners. A light and bright bathroom positioned beside them includes vanity, bath and oversized shower.
The single garage has a remote door, convenient space at the end for storage or workbench and direct access to both the residence and the rear yard.
Perfect for owner-occupiers or investors, the cutting edge apartment adjoins quiet parkland in the heart of Flora Hill within walking distance to all facilities – LaTrobe University, Strath and Kennington Village shopping centres, cafes, pubs, Brennan park Pool and and picturesque Kennington Reservoir walking paths.

Serene personality, this solid & spacious craftsman renovation will impress. Designed to the highest of standards, offering high-end fittings & fixtures throughout, it has truly been transformed. Complemented by a dressing room with central chandelier & an abundance of storage with built in cabinetry it is every girls dream.
The flexible floor plan offers two wings with central zone connecting & accommodating for a large family.The paved rear alfresco overlooks a spacious swimming pool. The kids will appreciate this space complete with diving board and loads of room for entertaining. The tiered garden features established planting throughout and at the rear of the block is a 6 m x 4.5 m garden shed.
Additional features include:
- Newly renovated throughout to a very high standard
- Modern, high-end NEFF kitchen appliances including four-burner induction cooktop, electric oven, rangehood and dishwasher
- Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout
- Secure access from inside the house to the large double garage

- Access to the backyard from both sides of the house
- Flexible layout ideal for the modern family
This is the place where your dream home meets serenity! Less than 10 minutes from the centre of Bendigo, unique and spacious this abode is ready to move in & enjoy. Offering the perfect blend of modern finishes and practical contemporary living, alongside the character and individuality of an architecturally designed property, this spectacular home is a rare opportunity.

Description:
SPACE AND STYLE IN THIS RETRO FAMILY HOME
Positioned in a popular Kennington street and just minutes from the amenities of Strathdale and Bendigo’s CBD is this one-of-a-kind family home. Built in 1975, the character-filled property has been renovated to meet the standards of the modern family, whilst still retaining many of its original and unique features.
A high fence around the yard, and a secure gate behind the carport offers security and privacy leading to the home. Stepping up to the entry, the style and grandeur of the property is apparent and as you come in the front door, the detail of the architecture is beautifully displayed. Split level living; combined with high, vaulted ceilings with exposed timber beams and floor-to-ceiling windows all add to the appeal of the main living space. Steps down from the entry hall lead to the kitchen and living spaces, and steps up take you to a mezzanine – ideal for a home office, or additional living space – and then on into the master suite.
A hallway off the main entry leads to three bedrooms, all with built-in storage, as well as a large family bathroom, separate toilet, linen closet and an additional closet perfectly housing a Euro laundry. The master bedroom, at the top of the stairs off the main entry, is the perfect retreat. A spacious room with ceiling fan and split system, the room also features a walk-in robe and huge ensuite with a double shower. A door from the master bedroom opens out to a private balcony overlooking the backyard.
The modern kitchen and dining space offers plenty of storage, including a large butler’s panty. A single step takes you up to the living room, and a large slider cleverly separates the two spaces if required. Polished concrete flooring perfectly complements the living and kitchen areas.
Large glass sliding doors lead out the garden. A lovely paved space adjoins a spacious deck – perfect for entertaining. An inground swimming pool, complete with water slide, can be easily observed from the alfresco area, and a generous lawn and established trees in garden beds complete the side garden. A smaller garden is located at the rear of the home, and a third garden area with a small shed can be found around the other side of the property.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling and ceiling fans throughout
Ducted, zoned gas floor heating throughout
Modern appliances in the kitchen
Stunning modern fixtures and fittings perfectly suiting the design of the home
Access from both sides of the property into the rear garden
Ample storage
Garden shed and pool equipment storage shed
This fabulous property is located in a quiet, pretty street in a popular, tightly-held area. Close to schools, shops, bus stops and all amenities, you are literally minutes from everything. With plenty of space both inside and out, this retro charmer is the perfect oasis for the modern family.

Kitchen with ample cupboards, benches and electrical appliances including dishwasher.
Fully tiled original bathroom with separate toilet and laundry.

Double carport meets up with the welcoming asphalt drive, plus separate third vehicle accommodation for a boat, caravan or camper.

This property is a one-off in today's market.
